detectors.description:
C2CToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/C2CToken.sol#360-372) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(now >= startDate && now <= endDate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/C2CToken.sol#361)
	- now <= bonusEnds (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/C2CToken.sol#363)
detectors.markdown:
[C2CToken.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/C2CToken.sol#L360-L372) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool)(now >= startDate && now <= endDate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/C2CToken.sol#L361)
	- [now <= bonusEnds](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/C2CToken.sol#L363)
